SEARCH
Package co.edu.uptc.controller

Class AccountController

java.lang.Object
co.edu.uptc.controller.AccountController
public class AccountController extends Object
The Account Controller class allows to manage a collection of accounts that will be available in the execution of the program, as well as the creation, deletion and editing of passwords.

      public void loadAccounts(ArrayList<Account> accounts)

    • updateInformationFile

      public void updateInformationFile()

    • addAccount

      public boolean addAccount(String id, String name, String lastName, String role)
      The AddAccount method allows the creation and addition of an account to the collection of accounts, validating the input parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - institution member code
      name - Institution member names
      lastName - Last name of the member of the institution
      role - Role of the member in the institution
      Returns:
      true if the account was added successfully, false if it already exists or the parameters are invalid

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      getUserName returns the generated user
      Returns:
      String with generated user

    • getPassword

      public String getPassword()
      getPassword returns the generate password
      Returns:
      String with password

    • findAccount

      public Account findAccount(String username, String password)
      findAccount allows you to search for an account based on username and password
      Parameters:
      username -
      password -
      Returns:
      Object of type Account, said object will be null, if it is not found in the collection

    • removeAccount

      public boolean removeAccount(String username, String password)
      Allows you to remove an account from the collection based on username and password
      Parameters:
      username -
      password -
      Returns:
      true if the account was deleted, false if it was not deleted or not found

    • setNewPassword

      public boolean setNewPassword(String username, String password, String newPassword)
      Allows changing an account password from username and password
      Parameters:
      username - account user to change password
      password - old password
      newPassword - new password
      Returns:
      true if the change was successful, false if the account was not found or the new password is invalid

    • getUsernames

      public String[] getUsernames()
      Returns the users in an array, this method is used for user generation
      Returns:
      String[] returns all users in the account collection

    • showAccounts

      public String showAccounts()
